DOCNAME: CASE OF BOKAN AND OTHERS v. BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants live in GPE .

CARDINAL . By CARDINAL judgments of ORG DATE , DATE , DATE , CARDINAL DATE and CARDINAL DATE which became final on CARDINAL DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE , respectively , ORG ( an Entity of GPE ) was ordered to pay , within DATE , the following amounts in convertible marks ( BAM ) in respect of war damage with default interest at the statutory rate :
BAM CARDINAL,CARDINAL in respect of non - pecuniary damage and BAM CARDINAL,CARDINAL in respect of legal costs to Mr GPE ;
BAM CARDINAL,CARDINAL in respect of non - pecuniary damage and BAM CARDINAL,CARDINAL in respect of pecuniary damage to the Jovešs ;

BAM CARDINAL,CARDINAL in respect of non - pecuniary damage , BAM CARDINAL,CARDINAL in respect of pecuniary damage and BAM CARDINAL,CARDINAL in respect of legal costs to the ORG .

CARDINAL . The applicants , except for Mr PERSON and the ORG , complained of non - enforcement to ORG the LAW ” ) . On different dates ORG found a breach of LAW No . The applicants did not claim compensation , but even if they had done so , their claim would most likely have been refused ( see , for example , ORG decisions ORG CARDINAL of DATE , § CARDINAL ; ORG CARDINAL of DATE , § CARDINAL ; ORG CARDINAL of DATE , § CARDINAL ; ORG CARDINAL of DATE , § DATE ) .

CARDINAL . After an extensive information campaign explaining the available options for the settlement of ORG public debt ( including its debt arising from domestic judgments ) , DATE and DATE the applicants informed the authorities that they agreed to be paid only the legal costs in cash and the principal debt and default interest in bonds . Government bonds were then issued on the following dates :
on DATE to PERSON and PERSON , on DATE to PERSON , on DATE to Ms PERSON ;
on DATE to PERSON and PERSON and on DATE to PERSON .
CARDINAL . PERSON , Mr PERSON , the ORG , and the ORG have already sold some or all of their bonds on ORG .
